content: Can I get a review/merge of #16250 please? In my quest to remove cases'/induction' from mathlib this removes them from Combinatorics; I plan to make a few "automated" removal PRs after this
(While I'm at it, #15555 by @Joachim Breitner has been sitting like a duck for weeks now with nobody batting an eye at it)

Jeremy Tan said:

I plan to make a few "automated" removal PRs after this

Of which the first one is #16451

Jeremy Tan said:

(While I'm at it, #15555 by Joachim Breitner has been sitting like a duck for weeks now with nobody batting an eye at it)

Aaahrg, I had a question 3 weeks ago... but somehow forgot to post it.

I made a list of all uses of cases' in mathlib and automating their removal should follow pretty shortly. But first I'd like to get #16451 merged, both because that will make my further automated cleanup PRs easier and because #16451 is liable to rot
Just noting that the maintainers want to discuss the fate of these primed tactics. Please be patient with us. (I sent you a DM with other refactoring ideas!! :-)
